thread.title: 10 Indians in main draw of MSLTA-ATP Challenger
thread.title_full: 10 Indians in main draw of MSLTA-ATP Challenger - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: 10 Indians in main draw of MSLTA-ATP Challenger
text:
Top 10 Indian players, including Davis Cuppers Yuki Bhambri and Somdev Devvarman, along with Saketh Myneni, Ramkumar Ramnathan, Sanam Singh and Junior Wimbledon doubles champion Sumit Nagal will be in action at the MSLTA-organised US$50,000 KPIT ATP Challenger to be played at the Shiv Chattrapathi Mhalunge Balewadi Tennis Complex from October 24-31.
A number of international players will also be in the fray, vying for top honours. They include James Ward of England (a member of the British Davis Cup team) and Yanick Mertens of Belgium, both of whom will be representing their respective nations in the 2015 Davis Cup final.
Former World No 65 Russia's Evegeny Donskoy and Spain's Adrian Menendez-Maceiras are some of the prominent names to have confirmed their participation.
